scripts.build: npm run build-cs && npm run build-opt && npm run build-back
scripts.pack: rm -fr tmp/ && npm run build && mkdir -p tmp && cp -r thin-content-script.js token-watcher.js icon* *.html manifest.json dist vendor tmp/ && cd tmp/ && zip -r archive * && mv archive.zip ../ && cd ..
scripts.pack-sources: rm -fr tmpsrc/ && mkdir -p tmpsrc && cp -r icon* *.html *.js *.json vendor *.md tmpsrc/ && cd tmpsrc/ && zip -r sources * && mv sources.zip ../ && cd ..
scripts.watch-site: ls *.js site/* | entr browserifyinc -vd site/app.js -o site/bundle.js
